searches.rationale: Broad search targeting reputable sources on U.S. elections and campaign finance.

parameters.query: 2026 U.S. Midterm Elections: Candidate Landscape, Campaign Finance Trends, and Legislative Priorities

searches.rationale: Broader search for news and press releases related to government efficiency initiatives.

parameters.query: government efficiency initiatives press release "Brooke Rollins"

results.title: Secretary Rollins Takes Bold Action to Stop Wasteful Spending and Optimize USDA to Better Serve American Agriculture
results.snippet: Today, U.S. Secretary of Agriculture Brooke Rollins addressed more than 400 USDA staffers, stakeholders and friends and pledged to bring greater efficiency...

metatags.og:title: Secretary Rollins Takes Bold Action to Stop Wasteful Spending
metatags.og:description: In a bold move, Secretary Rollins has committed to eliminating wasteful spending within the USDA and optimizing its operations to better serve American agriculture.
